16000 km of virtual fence : drones, sensors... No indication of a physical fence. Data not taken into account for the total. Sisfron. satellite technology, electromagnetic signaling, tactical communications, drones and an increased army presence to monitor the border areas. According to experts, only about 20 percent of the area that Brazil is trying to cover is actually accessible. Most of it lies in thick Amazon forest, marshland, or is traversed by large river systems.

71 million euro. 2.5-meter high barbed-wire fence. New Iron Curtain? The Baltic States used to be under Soviet occupation until the collapse of the Soviet Union. Since then, the three states joined the EU and NATO. Tensions with Moscow remain (e.g. Estonian security official Eston Kohver jailed to 15 years in a Russian prison for spying). Russia mocks Estonian plans. Latvia is said to be discussing the possibility of building a (anti-immigration) wall as well (27.08.15)
